text: Aggur n ÔÖemvan, ideg d irs Leqwôan, d nnhaya i medden, d abeggen n nnhaya akked ufraz. Win segwen iwalan illul ed waggur, a t iuzum. Win iuvnen ne$ illan ippinig, annect n wussan nniven. Öebbi Ib$a yawen sshala, ur awen Ib$a ara cedda. A pfukem tallit, a pkabrem Öebbi imi kwen Inha, amar a ppesnemmrem.
